author: morciuch
msg: Security Ref list box in the customizers (PortletCustomizer and PortletSetCustomizer) is now visible to admin only.

This behaviour can be modified by changing the security ref for "_security_ref" parameter in PortletCustomizer and security ref for "securityRef" parameter in PortletSetCustomizer. Currently security constraint "user-view_admin-all" is used to control availability of Security Ref list box.

author: taylor
msg: Fixed bug where logout/save was crashing
